attributes.action: Put asthmatics back on the clinically vulnerable list.
attributes.additional_details: Since asthmatics are recognized as clinically vulnerable by the NHS and I know many people who need this vaccine since if they catch COVID, they could lose their lives.
attributes.background: Literally, add asthmatics back to the Group 6 Vaccine List.

rejection.details:
Decisions about who is clinically extremely vulnerable is a clinical decision, not the responsibility of the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Prioritise all asthmatics for the Covid vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569984
